sentences.en: 'Come in, Mr Dance,'says he, very stately and condescending.
sentences.cn: “ 进来, 丹斯先生.”他摆着架子非常庄重地说.

sentences.en: an avenue of stately chestnut trees
sentences.cn: 两边有雄伟高大栗树的林荫道

sentences.en: He declined the invitation with stately grace.
sentences.cn: 他庄严而文雅地谢绝了邀请.

sentences.en: Instead of moving at his usual stately pace, he was almost running.
sentences.cn: 他没像平时那样优雅庄重地走着，而是几乎跑了起来。

sentences.en: It is a very stately palace.
Off to one side, the stately memorial to Thomas Jefferson.
sentences.cn: 稍偏一些就是庄严雄伟的托马斯-杰斐逊纪念堂.

sentences.en: People understood that Tellson's, in a stately way, tolerated the odd - job - man.
sentences.cn: 大家知道台尔森银行颇有气派地容忍了这个干零活的.

sentences.en: Priceless antique furniture was destroyed in the fire at the stately home.
sentences.cn: 那座富丽堂皇的宅第里价值连城的古董家具在大火中付之一炬了.

sentences.en: The building rose before him, tall and stately.
sentences.cn: 那座高大宏伟的建筑耸立在他面前。

sentences.en: The procession moved at a slow and stately speed.
sentences.cn: 队伍以缓缓而庄严的速度行进.

sentences.en: The stately mansion crested the hill.
the stately progress of the procession
sentences.cn: 游行队伍缓慢而庄严的行进

sentences.en: The stately swan glides gracefully on the pond.
sentences.cn: 天鹅在池面上优美地游动.

sentences.en: We became suspended in some stately never-never land of pleasure, luxury and idleness.
sentences.cn: 我们流连忘返大气、奢华、惬意、闲适的世外桃源。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 开放供参观的豪华古宅

trans.tran_cn: 庄严的，高贵的，雄伟的，富丽堂皇的
